name: Flipping Amazing
description: Brewed in Collaboration with Ex-Libris WDBC Private Brew Day Auction winner, Mark Kruck, this big rich Imperial Stout was brewed with Floor Malted Bohemian Dark Malt and an assortment of caramel and roasted malts for a full-bodied malt character with notes of dark fruits, caramelized sugar and an assertive roasty coffee and chocolate note. Chinook hops help balance the huge malt character with a pleasant piney bitterness.
tasting: Dark fruits, caramelized sugar, coffee, & chocolate notes
